QuestData.Title: The Prison Rooftop
QuestData.Description: I don't understand why the king wants to waste time saving his hide, but if you want to risk your life, then be my guest.$B$BCrowley and his men are holed up upstairs, probably plotting against the king as we speak!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Darius Crowley upstairs in the Stoneward Prison in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: Greymane's right. These beasts do not give a damn about our politics.$B$BGilneas needs to stand together.
